short_summary: The Correctional Service Canada, Ontario Region, Kingston, wishes to procure: *Roofing service, installation and repair for toit replacement in the Stone Gables Building, according to specifications; Ice and water shield on all eaves, valleys, and chimneys.
description: The Correctional Service of Canada requires the services of a qualified roofing contractor.
duration_in_months: Il s'agit d'une durée de 1 an.
